snippet: The one-night fund-raiser for the center's arts, outreach and education programs brought in $2.4 million.
abstract: The one-night fund-raiser for the center's arts, outreach and education programs brought in $2.4 million.

byline.original: By ASHLEY SOUTHALL and EMMARIE HUETTEMAN

headline.main: David Foster Leads an Intimate Kennedy Center Gala
